document_name: Law 93/2010, of 16 December on measures to promote economic activity and social rationalization and optimization of the resources of the government
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/AND/2010/AND-2010-12-16-Law 93_2010, of 16 December on measures to promote economic activity and social rationalization and optimization of the resources of the government_bf60d56f289a7122665277f83003d8b2.pdf
document_description:
This law implements measures to promote economic and social activity, and rationalize and optimize the resources of the Administration.

Article 17 on energy service companies include renewable energies and energy efficiency as part of their goals.
Article 18 more generally sets energy efficiency as a prime goal for Andorra. Article 19 details the importance of implementing more renewable sources in the energy mix.
